document_data.name: Mirna Dendrar
document_data.mainbody: '''Mirna Dendrar''' was a resident of [[Phandalin]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Mirna had a husband named [[Thel Dendrar|Thel]]. They had two children, [[Nars Dendrar|Nars]] and [[Nilsa Dendrar|Nilsa]].
document_data.History:
Mirna was born in Thundertree where her family ran an herbalism and alchemy shop prior to the town's destruction by the eruption of [[Mount Hotenow]].

''Circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} the [[Redbrand]] bandits of Phandalin made crude leers at Mirna. Her husband, Thel, had had enough of the group that terrorized the area, and so he stood up to them. He was subsequently killed by them.

After her husband's death, she and her two children were taken to the cellar of [[Tresendar Manor]], and thrown into the slave pen. The Redbrands planned to sell them off as slaves.
